alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 145 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northeast of West Wendover, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lucin and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 0 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
